original_text: And he brought us out from there, that he might bring us in and give us the land that he swore to give to our fathers.
korean_text: 우리 조상들에게 맹세하신 땅을 우리에게 주어 들어가게 하시려고 우리를 거기서 인도하여 내시고

sentences.original_text: And he brought us out from there
that he might bring us in
that he swore to give to our fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그분께서 우리 조상들에게 주시겠다고 맹세하신 것입니다
